sliderTitleFirst: The right way to your backpack
sliderDescriptionFirst: Whether you want a backpack with a laptop holder, one with lots of compartments, or a simple banana bag the choice is up to you and your needs.
sliderDescriptionSecond: In the spring, we are ready to closely monitor how men run in search of a gift on March 8, brands release new collections, and our wishlist is replenished with new trends of the season.
sliderDescriptionThird: Our team consists of five people, all of whom believe in what we do. We work from dawn till dusk for you to receive your HORONDI in time.
constructorName: Such a new thing will allow you to show your creativity and create a unique style.
